summary: Executive Director with 35+ years of public service experience in administrative management, logistics, budget management, emergency management, security, antiterrorism, force protection, training and instruction, and community arts programming. Proven ability to develop strategic plans, secure funding, manage grants, coordinate with local, state and federal agencies, and lead large teams and volunteers.

experience.title: Executive Director
experience.description: Executive Director responsible for pursuing funding, interacting with community and government agencies, realigning strategic plan, managing grants, increasing patronage through web/social media, coordinating productions, supervising volunteers, arranging master classes, and fostering collaborations with local museums and public entities.

experience.title: Chief Warrant Officer Four, Operations Officer
experience.company: United States Coast Guard (PATFORSWA) / Operational Leadership
experience.description: Directed forward operating base personnel in Kuwait during Operation Iraqi Freedom; deck watch officer for patrol boats; liaison with regional partners for at-sea enforcement; planned and directed Personal Protective Services for U.S. and foreign officials; directed emergency management for military bases; conducted background investigations; led police force; liaised with local and federal agencies; administered administrative support and training; oversaw contracting and shipboard maintenance programs.

certifications: Antiterrorism Force Protection Level II Certification (U.S. Coast Guard)
